projects.name: E-Commerce Platform
projects.description: Full-stack e-commerce solution with custom cart, payment integration, and admin dashboard
projects.experience: Built a scalable e-commerce platform handling 10k+ daily users with real-time inventory management and secure payment processing
challenges: Implementing real-time inventory synchronization across multiple warehouses
Optimizing checkout flow to reduce cart abandonment
Building admin dashboard with complex filtering and analytics
developmentFlow: Week 3-4: Database design and API setup

projects.name: 3D Product Configurator
projects.description: Interactive 3D product customizer for furniture with real-time rendering and AR preview
projects.experience: Developed immersive 3D product configurator allowing customers to customize furniture with real-time visual feedback and AR preview capabilities
challenges: Optimizing 3D model loading and rendering performance
Building AR preview functionality for mobile devices
developmentFlow: Week 3-5: R3F integration and scene setup

projects.name: AI-Powered Analytics Dashboard
projects.description: Business intelligence dashboard with AI insights and predictive analytics
projects.experience: Created intelligent analytics platform that processes large datasets and provides AI-powered insights and trend predictions
challenges: Processing and visualizing large datasets efficiently
Integrating AI models for predictive analytics
developmentFlow: Week 7-8: AI integration and model training
